text: Joni Juho Paavali Puurula (born August 4, 1982) is a Finnish former ice hockey goaltender. Puurula was selected by the Montreal Canadiens in the 8th round (243rd overall) of the 2000 NHL Entry Draft. Puurula made his SM-liiga debut playing with HPK during the 2000–01 SM-liiga season.http://www.jatkoaika.com/Haastattelu/joni-puurula-huikean-jampan- paluu/84900 ==References== ==External links== * Category:1982 births Category:Living people Category:AaB Ishockey players Category:Amur Khabarovsk players Category:Anglet Hormadi Élite players Category:Arlan Kokshetau players Category:Asplöven HC players Category:SG Cortina players Category:Finnish ice hockey goaltenders Category:HPK players Category:Jokerit players Category:Kokkolan Hermes players Category:Leksands IF players Category:Montreal Canadiens draft picks Category:SaiPa players Category:Salavat Yulaev Ufa players Category:KH Sanok players Category:IF Sundsvall Hockey players Category:HC TPS players Category:Vaasan Sport players Category:SSI Vipitino players
